poll_info.title: NuggMD Cannabis Consumer Poll - Preferred Consumption Method
poll_info.methodology: Digital questionnaire sent to verified, representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets

questions.question_text: What is your preferred method of cannabis consumption?

demographics.population: Representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets
demographics.sample_method: Sourced from independent providers of verified consumer data and first-party data
demographics.verification: Regular cannabis users. A strong majority of the sample reports daily or weekly cannabis use.
